title: Features Distilled
description: Schema for distilled feature list from large markdown documents. Created by Analyst agent when input document exceeds 15KB to prevent context window overflow.

features.description: List of features extracted and summarized from the original markdown document

id.description: Unique identifier for the feature (e.g., feature-1, feature-2)

description.description: Brief description of the feature (summarized from original document)

dependencies.description: List of feature IDs this feature depends on

notes.description: Additional notes or context from the original document

summary.description: High-level summary of all features extracted from the original document

original_document_size_kb.description: Size of the original markdown document in kilobytes

original_file_path.description: Path to the original markdown document

preserved_sections.description: List of section names from original document that were preserved

removed_sections.description: List of section names that were removed during distillation (e.g., verbose examples, detailed implementation notes)

quality_metrics.description: Quality metrics for feature extraction (added by validation process)

extraction_completeness.description: Percentage of features successfully extracted from original document (0-100)

information_preservation.description: Percentage of critical information preserved during distillation (0-100)

critical_details_preserved.description: True if all critical details (acceptance criteria, dependencies, priorities) were preserved

all_features_have_acceptance_criteria.description: True if all features have acceptance criteria

dependencies_mapped.description: True if all feature dependencies are properly mapped

quality_score.description: Overall extraction quality score (0-100), calculated from completeness and preservation metrics

validated_at.description: Timestamp when quality validation was performed
